me.title: Who I Am.
me.text: My name is Daniel Abros, and I am a human being. Let's be realistic, can you really describe a person with just a few fun facts?

doing.title: What I Do.
doing.text: I work full-time as a freelance frontend developer. Although I specialize in building websites, I love variety and enjoy taking on unique creative challenges.

from.title: Where I Am From.
from.text: I grew up in the Siberian city of Surgut (if you don't know where that is, you should definitely look it up). Currently, I live in the beautiful capital of Poland â€“ Warsaw.
